nodes.text: Veraul was a member of the Free Ryloth Movement who died during their attempt to kill Galactic Emperor Sheev Palpatine. The movement's leader, Cham Syndulla, later included Veraul amongst a list of every movement member who had been lost in the assassination attempt shortly before the final attack on Palpatine, which was ultimately unsuccessful.
Veraul was first mentioned in Lords of the Sith, a novel written by Paul S. Kemp and released in 2015.
